Typical properties The transition elements are a collection of metals with similar properties, however, these properties differ from those elements in Group 1 (the alkali metals) even though they are also metals. Physical properties A physical property is a characteristic or feature that can be measured. A chemical reaction is not needed to determine a physical property.
